name: Green Chile and Rice Casserole
author: pcur
summary: Just in time for Christmas! I have NEVER served this in 25 years without raves or requests for the recipe. Note: the sour cream and cheese can be lowfat if you wish.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package dry instant long grain and wild rice mix
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles, drained
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Lightly grease a medium baking dish
Prepare the instant long grain and wild rice mix according to package directions
Spread 1/2 the cooked rice mix over the bottom of the prepared baking dish
In a bowl, mix the sour cream and green chiles
Spread 1/2 the sour cream mixture over rice, and top with 1/2 the cheese
Bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly
